text.div:
Laughter:

These are some of my fondest memories from life that have always brought a smile to my face or made me laugh:

My dogs make me laugh when they play together, and my grandchildren make me laugh when they put on plays for me. They bring me great joy.

valueString: These are some of my fondest memories from life that have always brought a smile to my face or made me laugh: My dogs make me laugh when they play together, and my grandchildren make me laugh when they put on plays for me.  They bring me great joy.
